Description: White painted pottery shabti of ʿnḫ:f-n-ḫnsw with black detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced eyes and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
